dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2245 IS: To amend the Digital Coast Act to improve the acquisition, integration, and accessibility of data of the Digital Coast program and to extend the program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Baldwin (for herself and Ms. Murkowski) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To amend the Digital Coast Act to improve the acquisition, integration, and accessibility of data of the Digital Coast program and to extend the program.

section.header: Acquisition, integration, and accessibility of data of Digital Coast program
section.text: Section 4 of the Digital Coast Act (16 U.S.C. 1467) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(1), by inserting and fully and freely available after readily accessible;
in subsection (d)(3)(D), by inserting , including data related to underground infrastructure and subsurface utilities after data; and
in subsection (g), by striking 2025 and inserting 2030.
